1.content: Who will be the first duelist to be beat? (If Yugi is not selected then he must be within viewing range.)
1.title: "It's time to duel!"

11.content:
I ACTIVE LINK BREAKER- GAMAGIL'S EFFECT! WHEN HIS LINK ARROWS ARE CONNECTED, HE CAN ATTACK YOU DIRECTLY! MAL BREAKER! the figure yelled.

The massive, virus and data-built monster raised it's arms and fired massive energy beams from them, enveloping and evaporating the other side of the Duel Field and the opposing Duelist in an explosive light..........

-----------------------------
THUD!

"Gah-Ow......!" Yugi clutched the back of his head, from where he had rolled out of bed.
He rubbed it as he sat up, wincing in pain. "What...was that dream?" he said. The dream.....it had been of of a duel, with who he wasn't sure. But it had been a duel that someone was losing....painfully. Was it an omen for the future?

*beep-beep BEEP*

The beeping noise from his Duelist PDA meant he had received a message form one of his friends. Yugi got up and picked it up to she who was messaging him......
11.title: Yugi

111.content:
It was from Joey. Yugi read the message as he massaged the back of his head.

To: Yugimotoh@dmail.com
From: Kingwheeler@dmail.com
Hey Yug
Just checking in doing good
with some news you might wanna hear
dunno if you’re still into dueling
after what happened with Atem and the ceremonial duel I understand why you’d wanna stop
but there’s some juicy stuff happening overseas
and I kinda wanna talk about it
Y know to take my mind of the upcoming tests and job searching
Let me you where you wanna meet up if you wanna meet up
-Joey

“Joey wants to chat, huh....?” Yugi muttered. It had been a while since he and Joey had hung out, as Yugi was cracking down hard on his tests so that he could try and get a job that allowed him to design make board and card games for a living. It didn’t leave much time for hanging out, but such was life. Yugi replied to Joey’s message with his own and then did his morning routine.
To: Kingwheeler@dmail.com
From: Yugimotoh@dmail.com
Hey, Joey.
Just got up, and I don’t have anything on today, so I can hang out with you.
Honestly needed a break from studying. Been having odd dreams.....of fake duels and fake monsters.....
Domino Park fine with you? I’d go to Dice City if hadn’t blown my allowance on Duel Monster cards.....I wonder if my Capsule Monsters will sell for anything?
and I’m kinda interested in the news
See ya soon- Yugi

By the time he was freshened up and dressed, Joey had replied back.

To: Yugimotoh@dmail.com
From: Kingwheeler@dmail.com
I forgot you have an allowance
all the money I get nowadays is hidden away from my old man
if it’s not spent on Duel Monsters stuff or snacks
Domino Park’s fine with me! I need some fresh air anyway.
Meet you there around 10 k?
-Joey

Pocketing his PDA, Yugi made his way downstairs to get some breakfast.
111.title: Setting up a hangout

choices: Joey tells Yugi about the strange news.
One of their friends approaches them.
1111.content:
Yugi’s breakfast was uneventful and rather plain, a bowl of cereal and some milk. Grandpa was busy setting up shop already, so Yugi didn’t get to talk with him until he was finished cleaning his plate off and was almost out the door. “Ah, Yugi, you’re finally up. Where are you going?“ he simply asked, while polishing the glass countertop he usually stood behind.
“Oh, I’m going to hang out with Joey today, Grandpa. Hope you don’t mind....” Yugi responded. Grandpa just nodded in acknowledgment. “That’s fine, but don’t forget to do your chores when you come home, okay?” “Okay.” was Yugi’s response. “Later, Grandpa!” And with that, Yugi stepped out the door, and made his way down to Domino Park.
—————-
Gandora the Dragon of Destruction
Monster
Attribute DARK
Types Dragon / Effect
Level 8
ATK / DEF 0 / 0
—————-
Domino Park was kinda busy today, and not because of any event: rather it was nice and sunny today. Yugi walked through the park on the pathways, looking for Joey.
“Hey, Yug! Over here!”
However, Joey found Yugi first. The two friends met up and begin taking as they walked, looking for a sunny spot to sit down and chat. Along the way......
1111.title: Meeting up with Joey

choices: A teenage girl, black spiky hair and yellow eyes.
A young man, with bluish white hair and blue eyes.
11111.content:
“.....So, Joey......what was that strange news you wanted to tell me about?” Yugi asked his friend. He wanted to know, and also wanted to break the slightly awkward silence that had just fallen after the their last topic had gone awry.

“Oh, yeah, that. Or rather those. Alright, where do I start with these.......ah, I know! You keep up with the overseas Duel Monsters Champions?” Joey begin to ramble. “Only with Rebecca.” was Yugi’s reply. “I’ve shifted focus, remember?”
“I know. Well, get this: the British Duel Monsters Champion, Edward Gale, was hospitalised a few days ago!”
“Really?” Yugi was kinda shocked by this. Was the overseas dueling that dangerous? “How so? Please tell me it wasn’t via a Duel......”
“Nope! His tea was poisoned. Heh, classical British......” The idea of poisoned tea seemed funny to Joey....though his smile faded when he saw Yugi’s disapproving stare. “It’s the irony that’s funny, Yug, not the dude getting hospitalised. Poisoned drinks are unhanded anyway. Besides, they don’t know if he did it himself or if was done by someone else.” He quickly explained, only getting an annoyed “Uh-Huh....” from Yugi.
“A-Anyway, it caused a big stir in the news.....and even more when the European Champion, Wallberto Kenny, basically acted like a total dick in response to the situation-“ “Europe and Britain are different countries, Joey. What’s one got to do with the other?” “I’m getting to it, he basically bad mouthed the dude and called him a coward, accusing the Edward dude of poisoning himself to back out of an upcoming Duel he had with him in a few days time. Said something like, “Such a coward. He couldn’t bear the idea of losing against me. No wonder he tried to take his life!” Got attacked by not only Edward’s fans, but turned a bunch of his own against him and got called out by the Asian Champion, Ramaja Xuju on social media.” Joey offloaded to Yugi, who responded with a “Wow.....”
“But that’s not all.” Joey continued. “This is where it gets gruesome. Two days ago, Wallberto was killed.”
“Wait, WHAT?!
“Yep. Pinned to a wall by a sword straight through the heart. No one knows who done it. And then on the same day, Ramaja nearly got killed by a car accident! He was lucky to survive, though he broke his right arm in the process.
“I......this is all terrifiying, Joey.....” Yugi admitted. “And it brings up a lot of questions....”
But before Yugi could ponder more, he was interrupted by someone.
11111.title: Le Strange News

choices: Head to the Docks! He has to save his friends!
Tristan! He hasn’t called Tristan! He may be safe or in trouble!
115.content:
...It was from an unknown sender. Yugi’s dagner senses went off the momment he read the very short but threating message in full.

To: yugiohmotoh@dmail.com
From: ????
Yugi Moto, If you value your friends, you wil come the Domino Pier alone, and with your deck. Let’s see if the King Of Games is a title you truely earnt.
-????

Yugi, hoping that this wasn’t true, dialed Joey as he picked up his deck and loaded it into his Duel Disk, which was (the deck, I mean), a very big work in progress. After a few rings, he got to Joey’s voicemail...........but Joey always answered his phone. Just then, the home phone rang just as he hung up Joey’s voicemail.

It was Tea. He scrambled down stairsto answer it, and-

“Yugi! Someone’s broken into my b-MRPHPGPH-

-the phone cut off. Yugi’s heart filled with dread. Joey and Tea were in trouble! He had to do something, fast!

But what?

choices: He spots an empty ship that’s got Tea and Joey tried to the pro
At the furthest pier, a man!
1151.content:
He had to head to the docks! Tea and Joey were in danger, and only he could save them! He didn’t know how, but he had to!

Even with this half functioning deck.......

As he quickly changed out of his pajamas and threw on some clothes, he got an idea that might help him. He grabbed his Duelist PDA and started texting Tristan as he forced his feet into a pair of sneakers. He finished composing his message and he attached his Duel Disk to his wrist, hit send on the message, and bolted out his room, and sped out of the house and towards Domino Pier.

To: tristiantaylor@dmail.com
From: yugiohmotoh@dmail.com
TRISTIAN, JOEY AND TEA HAVE BEEN KIDNAPPED THEYRE BEING HELD AT DOMINO PIER. THE KIDNAPPERS WANT TO DUEL ME FOR THEIR FREEDOM. IM HEADING OVER THERE TELL BAKURA TELL DUKE HELL EVEN CALL KAIBA BUT ESPICALLY CALL THE POLICE AND TELL THEM WHAT I TOLD YOU. STAY ON GUARD THEY COULD BE AFTER YOU TOO
————
1151.title: Head to the Docks! He has to save his friends!

12.content:
It was just an average day. Joey Wheeler was walking down the street. Man Thing sure have calmed down since the pharoh passed. I miss the exitment. Just then someone bumped into him. Hey watch it jerk. When Joey looked at the guy he took in all his features. He was a tall man with long grey hair with a red streak in it. THe man was wearing blue jeans and a red t-shirt. A black jacket and sunglasses finished the look. Well are you going to apollgize?
Are you Joey Wheeler? He asked.
Yeah why?
I wish to duel you. he said.
So you heard of me. Joey said. Alright then.
Okay, follow me. The man then led Joey somewhere. They stopped in the park. This seems like a good place.
Alright then. Joey then put his duel disk on. Then let's do this.
Very well. Then man then pulled his duel disk out. It was black insead of the normal white. Since I challeged you, I will let you deside who goes first.
Okay. Watch and be amazed. I summon Aligator Sword in attack mode. And then I end.
My move. I activate the spell card, Final Countdown. Just then a ball of light appeared above them. Then I will lay two cards face down and call it a turn.
Hey, You did not play a monster. And what does this Final Countdown card do?
Start your turn and you will see.
Okay My move. Just then a second ball of light appeared. What is the meaning of this?
Think of final countdown as... A spell Exodia.
What? Exodia!
That's right. but there is a bright side. If you manage to defeat me before this card fully charges then you win.
How long do I have?
As of now. 18 turns.
Then I better get to work. I summon Rocket Warrior in attack mode. Now Aligator Sword attack.
No you don't. From my hand I discard a monster you may know. He shoed it to Joey.
Kuriboh, that's Yugi's monster. I end.
My move.
Turn three.
I play Pot of Duality. I look at the top three cards of my deck and show them to you. Intesting. He showed his cards.
Two of them are exodia pieces.
Rightbut I choose to add this card. Then I shuffle the two cards i did not pick back into my deck. Now I play One Day of Pease.
What does that do?
We each draw one card. they both draw there cards. And neither of us take battle damage until your next turn. i end my turn.
He didn't summon a monster this turn either. Joeu said. There must be somthing I can do to win.
Turn Four.
12.title: Joey

121.content:
The must be somthing I can do. Joey asked him self.
What. He still had no monsters And I have two. And look I have Red-Eyes Black Dragon in my hand. I tribute My Aligator sword and rocket warrior in order to summon my Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
That would be the case if not for my trap, Bottomless Trap Hole. With this I banish your dragon.
My Red-Eyes. No. I set two cards and end my turn.
My move.
Turn 5.
I set a card face down. then I activate the spell card Pot of Greed. I draw two cards. I will end.
Turn 6.
I active Scapgoats.
No you don't Dark Bribe. This card negates and destroys a spell or trap when you activate it. Then you get to draw a card.
Joey draw his card. I set one monster in defence postion, and two face downs. I end.
My turn then.
Turn 7.
I will set a card and end.
Turn 8.
I am getting tire of this. I tribute my set monster to summon Jinzo. with jinzo you can't activate your traps. Now attack.
I summon Battle fader.
Battle what?
Fader. If i am attacked I can summon it and end the battle.
I end with a Face down.
my move then.
Turn 9.
I tribute my battle fader for Caius the Shadow Monarch
Next I activate his effect . when tribute summon I baish a card my opponent has and if it was a dark monster I inflickt 1000 damage to my opponit. Bye Jinzo.
No my Jinzo.
Now I attack.
I end.
Turn 10.
I will not give up. Joey said.
Joeu throw card ofter card out but it was now use.
turn 19.
End.
Turn 20.
121.title: Contiue the duel

1211.content:
When the duel ended the man walked over to Joey. What do you want now. He then pushed him down. Hey!
He then picked up his deck. Pathitic. He said. You had a deck of this strenth. How weak.
Hey don't dis respect my deck. And give it back.
Fine. He then throw the deck in the air and the cards scattered.
My cards. Joey then tryied to gather his cards back together. What was the meaing of that?
I have a message. He then grabbed Joey's shirt. Tell Yugi Muto that if he wishes to get your card back. He showed Joey the Time wizard. That he must come to the docks. He then tossed Joey. Tell him that if he is not there in two hours or if you come alone I will rip up the card and throw the pieces into the water. Meet you there. The man then took out a skateboard and then rode off.
Joey then ran to fine Yugi and told him want happened. That is unspeakable. Yugi said.
Don't worry I will get the time wizard back.
Thank you Yugi. I should tell you that he uses a card called Final Countdown that once played will allow him to win in twenty turns. Joey said.
Thanks for the heads up. Let's go. Yugi and the gang then made there way to the docks.
Good you are here. the man said.
Okay return Joey's card to him are else.
Okay. The man then throw the card to Yugi. He can have it back I have no intest in it.
Who are you? Yugi asked.
The name is Han. That is all you need to know. Are you ready to duel.
If i have to i will.
Good but I will not be your opponent.
IF not you Then who? Joey asked.
Me. Just then a man with long white hair wearing a blue trench coat. The name is Kenta. And I will be your oponent.
Okay then.
The two the got theire duel disks out and started the duel.
1211.title: After the duel

12111.content:
I will make the first move. Kenta said. This hand does not look good. Good thing I have this. I activate Card Destruction. Now we both sent our hands the the grave and dreaw the same amount from our decks. What do you know I just draw a good card. I activate the spell card Future Fusion.
What does that card do? Yugi askes.
Like polmorazation I take monsters to fusion summon a monster. But i can use cards from my deck instead. I now send these five monsters to the grave.
There all dragons. Yugi said. That means.
Right Five Headed Dragon. But don't worry it will not came out for two turns. I set a monster in face down defence and one card face down. Your move.
My draw. I have to thank you. You allowed me to summon my favorite card. I play monster reborn and summon Dark Magician.
Is that so. Kenta said.
Now Dark Magician attack.
Thank you for that. You destroyed my Masked dragon so now I can summon a second.
I lay down two card face down and set a monster in defence mode. End.
My move. I banish my masked dragon to special summon this monster. Come forth, Red-Eyes Darkness Metal Dragon.
He has a red-eyes. Joey said.
No disrespect to your monster Joey, but my dragon is much better because his effect allows me to summon another dragon from my hand or grave. Except another Red-Eyes Darkness Metal Dragon. Kenta then yelled into the sky. I hope Seto Kaiba is watching because I now summon from my grave, the Blue-Eyes WHite Dragon.
A Blue-Eyes! Joey said. How do you have one of Kaiba's cards?
That is my buisness. Kenta said. Now I summon Mirage Dragon. Trap cards can not active. Now Red-Eyes attacks. Dark Magician is destroyed. Now attack.
I don't think so. My facedown monster is Marchmellon.
I set a card face down and end.
Next turn His Five Headed Dragon will arrive. I will defeat you. Yugi said. I set one card face down and next I summon Beta the magnet warrior. He will attack your Mirage dragon. With that The dragon was gone. I will end.
My move. Just then...
12111.title: Kenta First

121111.content:
Then someone jumped out of the chopper. He landed and took a helmet off revealing it to be Seto Kaiba. Good your hear Kaiba.
No games. You are just lucky I don't have you arested for theif.
Thief, So my friend here took Wheeler's Time Wizard. We gave it back. Oh you mean the Blue-Eyes That is impossible.
And way is that? Kaiba asked.
Because this one is mine. Kenta then help the Blue-Eyes up.
The design is different. Who are you?
Tell You what. Since you are here I will tell you. But tell me do you believe that Time travel is a possiblity?
So you are telling me that you are from the future. Prove it.
Okay. Tell me how Duel Academy going? This shocked Kaiba. You at least know there is something amiss so leave it at that. Now To contiue the duel. I use my Red-eye's effect to summon from my hand Geneisis Dragon. Now I attack.
I know you are going to do that. Go Mirror force.
Now all my monsters are destroyed. How sad. But Not much. I summon Red-Eyes wyvren.
I activate my face down. Dark Corfoficus now I sacrafice your wyvren and my beta to summon Dark Magician.
I end.
My move. Yugi said. I tribute Marchmellon to summon Dark Magician Girl They will attack. Kenta's life points hit zero. I won so I would like answers.
I lost, but there is no way I will tell you...
We have been hired by someone who also paid us to set this get together up. His proxy will be here soon.
Just then a man in a dark robe appeared.
Who are you? Seto asked.
The bosy is a robot but I may self am human more the less. You may call me Z.
Well Z, I don't know what your game is but I don't like it.
My game is duel monsters,and I know that you do like it so much Seto Kaiba. If not then you would have given your deck to Mokuba instead of sealing it away.
Tell me, Why you are dong this? Joey asked.
Joey Wheeller, I wish to duel Yugi Muto at his best.
Then came out and we will duel.
I would love to but you are not at your best.
Well prove that you are from the future then.
Very well. But not today. With that three motorcycles drove up and the tree jumpped on. We will meet, in the future. With that they rode off.
After this they all...
121111.title: One of Kaiba's choppers arrived.

1211111.content:
Yugi, Joey and the gang were whating in Kaiba's office. He soon returned.
Well? Yugi asked.
All my cards are counted for. He said before sitting behind his desk. So do you think he is telling the truth about being from the future.
I don't know. I have met with time travelers before. A mad man was trying to destroy the game of duel monsters but the three of use stopped him.
Three? Joey asked.
My self, a kid named Jaden, and a man named Yusei.
Kaiba that Kenta asked you something? Joey asked. What was it about same school?
If you must now, I have planned to start an school for young duelest. BUt I have not revealed the idea to anyone, not even Mokaba.
That Jaden kid said he learned from a place called Duel Academy.
Jaden, Was his name Jaden Yuki?
Yeah why?
he was the lucky kid that one the chance to design a duel monster card to be sent in space in one of our rockets. There is samething a miss here.
Well I am not just going to sit around here. Joey said as he ran out.
1211111.title: headed to Kaiba's office.

12111111.content:
Joey was walking the streets looking for any signs for the mystrey men. Where are you guys. Joey asked.
Someone was in watching from a top a building. So, Wheeler is afoot. a man with a dark cloak on said. What a waste ? Not worth my deck. He then draw a card. Isn't that right buddy. Put he will be of use. He followed Joey to an alley way and then jumped down.
Who are you? Are you one of those future duelists?
Gold stars. Now Wheeler be a good messager boy and make sure Kaiba gets this. He then throw a envolop to Joey. Don't open it. The man then left.
Guess I have no choose. Joey then returned to Kaiba Corps.
What are you doing here? Seto asked.
I met with of those duelists. He told me to give you this. Joey Handed it to Kaiba.
Seto opened it and was stunned. He then ran out and headed out. He then made his way to a warehouse. Good you got my Message.
Enough, now where is Mokuba?
He is here. he said. He then snapped his fingers and then Mokuba walked it up.
Mokuba. Seto walked up but then Mokuba said something.
Don't move. Seto stopped. He has this place litered with expolsives.
Let him go. Seto said.
If you can win in a duel with Mokuba while he uses my deck then you may take him. If you and Mokuba does not duel then I will set off the explosives myself. Win and you are free but lose and Mokuba will stay with us.
We don't have a choice. Mokuba said. He activated the duel disk that was on his arm.
Fine. Seto said.
Let's duel. They both said.
12111111.title: In the streets

121111111.content:
DUEL SYSTEM ON LINE. Said a computer voice.
Just as the duel was to start Yugi and Joey Arrived. What is this? Yugi asked. Why are you two about to duel?
That is my doing. The cloaked man said. If they don't then this entire place will go off. And if Seto loses then Mokuba stays with use.
That is a dirty trick. Joey said.
I don't see how? Since unlike you, Wheeler. Mokuba had a brother to learn from.
Enough Talk. Seto said. I will go first. I set two face downs and a monster in defence mode.
I thought I told you if you don't duel I will set the bombs off myself.
Just let Mokuba make his move.
Fine, ah and Mokuba, if i caught you hinting Seto about your cards then I will set the bombs off.
Fine. I draw. Sorry Big Brother. I special summon Cyber Dragon.
Cyber Dragon. What is that card?
A five star machine monster that can be special summon the owner's opponent has one are more monsters on the field and the card owner has none.
Now I summon a monster called Cyber Phoenix. I attack with Cyber Dragon.
Kaiba's monster was destroyed.
Now I attack directly.
I activate my cloning Trap card.
I set two cards face down and end.
My move and I will get you back Mokuba. Seto said.
121111111.title: Brother vs. Brother

12111112.content:
While Joey was storming off from kaibacorp, a future duelist had decided to have some fun. He was watching three of yugis dearest friends, Rebecca Hawkins, Tea Gardner, and Serenity Wheeler. The future duelist thought these girls could amuse him, so he approached to meet them. Meanwhile, the girls where talking about a movie they just watched.
"My favorite part was when Jack jumped from the roof onto the RV to sav-", Rebecca was talking when she noticed a figure approaching. "Who's that?", Serenity asked. "I don't know", Tea said in response to the obvious question. "My name is not important, but of course I'm here for a reason ", the future duelist said. "Why are you here?", Rebecca asked. "To duel you here and now, 3 on 1", the duelist said.
The girls where surprised to say the least, 3 on 1 seemed too easy. But, they accepted anyway and armed themselves. Rebecca was nervous about the stranger, they didn't know his strength. Serenity was excited, she knew the rules, and can finally test her deck from yugi. Tea was confident, as they had the number advantage. "Before we begin, shall I be the gentlemen and tell you my name after all? Its Valdor", the duelist said.
Valdor: 12000
Tea: 4000
Rebecca: 4000
Serenity: 4000
"I will start this duel, seeing as I have the disadvantage in numbers", Valdor said to the girls. "I draw. I summon, Summoner monk! When he's summoned, he's switched to defense mode automatically." Def 1600. "Next I use his effect, once per turn I send I spell from my hand such as this Half Shut spell. Once that's done, I can special summon a level 4 monster from my deck. But he can't attack this turn, not that he could anyway. I choose, Newdoria!" Def 800. "I discard Necro Gardna, to special summon The Tricky." Atk 2000. "I set one card and end", Valdor said.
"I draw!", Tea said. "I set a monster, then I play pot of greed to draw two cards. I set two cards and I end", Tea said.
"My move, I draw", Rebecca said. "I summon, Mystic Tomato", Atk 1400. "I set two cards and I end."
"Awesome, my move. I draw", Serenity said. "I activate Heavy Storm!", serenity said as the spell destroyed all spell and traps on the field. "Serenity! Be careful!", Tea and Rebecca said in unison. "Oops, sorry girls", serenity said as the girls frowned. But then they noticed Valdor, he was fuming mad. "I needed that DNA surgery, you insulent brat!", Valdor shouted. "Well, its gone now!", serenity said. "My next card is, Unshaven angler." Atk 1500. "I activate double summon, tributing unshaved angler. His effect activates, when he's tributes for a water monster he's two tributes. I summon, white Knight dragon!" Atk 3000. "I end", serenity said.
"I draw", Valdor said. "I play pot of greed, drawing two cards. I play, mound of the bound creator, a field spell. I sacrifice my three monsters to summon, winged dragon of ra!", Valdor said. Atk 11900. Valdor: 100. "I attack Teas set monster", Valdor said. "My set monster was morphing jar, his effect activates. So we discard and get new hands",tea said. "Very well, I set two cards. But since ra destroyed your monster, you take 1000 points of damage from the field spells effect", Valdor said. Tea: 3000. "I play mystical space typhoon to destroy my field, dont ask why, now I end", valdor said. Meanwhile, kenta, Han, and Z, were watching the duel from above on a roof. "You know he's gonna do it, he always does", Han said. The other two nodded in agreement.
"Its my turn, I draw!", tea said. "I activate the trap rainbow life, discarding a card for its effect", valdor said. "What does it do?", tea asked nervous. "Your about to find out, but first my other trap: ring of destruction!", valdor said. "What?! We'll all lose!", Rebecca shouted. "Rainbow life will add this damage to my life points for this turn. So I am gonna survive, but you are not", Valdor said as the ring went off. Valdor examined the life point counters, smiling coldly.
Valdor: 12000
Tea: 3000
Rebecca: 0
Serenity: 0
"What? Impossible, tea should have lost!", valdor shouted. Tea revealed a card in her hand: damage ring. "This quick-play spell card neutralized the damage to me, so its just us now", tea said. Rebecca and Serenity were surprised, Han and Kenta were shocked, but Z was smiling at this turn of events.
12111112.title: 3 on 1: an odd challenge

121111121.content:
"Now to continue my turn", Tea said. "I set a monster. Plus a facedown, I end", Tea said. "I draw, I special summon cyber dragon. I activate, Night beam! It destroys your set card automatically. Attack Cyber Dragon", Valdor said. "My set monster was cyber jar! Now all monsters are gone!", Tea said. "Next, we pick up the top 5 cards of our decks. Any monsters lvl 4 or lower, are special summoned. I have, Giant soldier of Stone", Def 2000. "I also summon, Beaver warrior", Def 1500.
"I summon giant orc", Atk 2200. "Headless Knight", Def 1700. "Slate Warrior", Atk 1900. "Last, but not least. I summon double coston", Def 1650. "4 monsters?!", Tea said shocked. "Its your move miss Tea", Valdor said. "I draw, I summon dark magician. I do so by sacrificing my, beaver warrior and my giant soldier of Stone!", Tea said. "Now dark magician, dark magic attack!", tea said. "I banish my Necro Gardna, to negate the attack", Valdor said. "I have no choice but to end", Tea said.
"I draw, I activate another pot of greed to draw 2 cards. Next is graceful charity, draw 3 discard 2. Then I end", Valdor said. "I draw", Tea said. "I set 2 cards, and attack Headless Knight!", Tea said. "I banish another Necro Gardna to stop the attack", Valdor said. "Are you gonna summon another phony Ra card?", Tea asked. "You thought that was fake?", Valdor asked as the three girls nodded. "Wrong, it was very real", Valdor said. "That's impossible, you're lying!", Tea said. "You'd know the truth had you talked to yugi, kaiba or joey tonight", Valdor replied.
As if on que, yugi and joey appeared on the scene next to Rebecca and Serenity. "Tea, be careful. This duelist is from the future", yugi shouted. "What!?!?", the girls shouted. "Oh yugi, you spoiled the surprise", Valdor said. "Its your move", Tea said. "I draw", Valdor said looking at his card and smiling.
"I activate fiends sanctuary, to generate a metal fiend token. I then sacrifice, giant orc, headless knight, and slate warrior. In order to special summon, Raviel lord of phantasms!", Valdor declared. Atk 4000. "I've never heard of this card before", yugi said. "I've only just begun, next I banish the fiends I just sacrificed. I special summon, Dark necrofear!", Valdor said. Atk 2200. "That's a tough card", joey said. "Now the curtain shines on the grand finale, I sacrifice my token, and double coston. I summon, the wicked avatar!",Valdor shouted. Atk 4100. "My avatar makes it so you can't use spell or trap cards, until after your 2nd end phase after he's summoned. Also, he's always 100 points stronger, then the next strongest monster on the field", Valdor said.
"I don't think Tea can get out of this", joey said. "Now for Raviels effect, I sacrifice my necrofear so Raviel gains its attack", Valdor said. Raviel Atk 6200. Wicked avatar Atk 6300. "Oh no, now avatar is even stronger", joey says. "Now wicked avatar attacks dark magician", Valdor declares.
Tea: 0
121111121.title: Valdors dark fury

1211112.content:
As the mysterious duellists drove off on their motorcycles, the chopper begin to land so Kaiba could get back on. He looked at Yugi and his friends with a sterner, crankier look then what was normally on his mug.
Kaiba: “Go home, you two. This is Kaiba Corp business.”
Yugi: “But, Kaiba
Kaiba: “Go home, Yugi.”
Yugi: “Joey and I can help you!”
Joey: “Besides, dey made dis pursonal! No one touches my Time Wizard! Dat’s the simbyol of me and Yug’s bonds!”
Kaiba: “The only duelist capable of facing those three down is me, Seto Kaiba, not the weaker half of the Pharoh and some wimpy chihuahua.”
Joey: “HEY!”
Yugi: “....Did you...not just see my win?”
Kaiba: “He lost on purpose, Yugi. Now, go home!”
As the chopper lands, Kaiba quickly get on it, but Yugi gets one last question in. “....what’s this Duel Academy he mentioned?” Yugi yelled over the rotors of the chopper.
Kaiba didn’t have a reply. The chopper took off, in the the direction of the
1211112.title: left.

121112.content:
A motorcycle engine could be heard, coming closer to them very quickly. it sounded far cleaner than a normal motorcycle engine...

While Yugi and Joey looked around for the source of the noise, Kenta shuddered.

"Well, that was quick....they've found me already." He said, deactivating the Duel and pulling out his skateboard. "Sorry, but we'll finish this duel another time, Yugi Moto."

Kenta FORFEIT
WINNER by rules, YUGI MOTO

"Huh?! Wait, what are you-" Yuig started, before Joey interrupted him, a manic grin on his face.

"He's running! What's tah matter? Scared of a noisy motorcycle? Chicken!" he jeered.

Kenta's reply was simple yet confusing. "I'm not a fan of the people on them." He kicked off on the skateboard, and rode off, just as a Red, very custom Motorcycle suddenly rounded the corner at the edge of the docks and quickly sped pass Yugi and Joey. They didn't get to see much of the rider, but he was wearing a red jumpsuit and his face was covered by a motorcycle helmet. He reached out when he caught up with Kent and grabbed him by the neck, and tossed him on the back of the bike, before turning the nearest corner and vanishing from sight.

"What tah hell?" Joey yelled. "Wha just happened!? He ran then got kidnapped by a biker!"

"Um, Joey?"
"What, Yug?"
"Here."
Yugi gave the Time Wizard back to Joey.
"My Time Wizard! Thanks, Yug. You're a lifesaver."
"Don't mention it. I'm glad I didn't have to go through much to get it back."

"Okay, now what do we do?" Joey asked Yugi.
121112.title: A masked figure appeared.

13.content:
It was 7 PM, the sun had just set, and Seto Kaiba was not happy. He had just received the results of the latest test for a new piece of technology he had had his engineers working on for the past few months. It was supposed to be a way of making duels even more exciting by giving the holograms mass, allowing the duelists to, for example, climb on top of them of them and ride them. But, according to the most recent report, the circuitry of the system was messed up, since, like in the previous tests, it had suddenly started emitting sparks about halfway through the duel, and before he knew it Kaiba was throwing out almost a million dollars worth of top of the line tech.

Kaiba leaned back in his chair and sighed heavily. "Even when I set my standards as low as they can reasonably be, those idiots STILL manage to disappoint me," he thought with a scowl.

Suddenly, the intercom on his desk turned on, and he heard the voice of his secretary. "Mr. Kaiba, sir? You have a visitor."

Kaiba growled and his forehead wrinkled. "Tell them to get lost. I'm not interested in buying girl scout cookies."

"Sir, he says he's here to discuss a possible business venture with you. He won't say anything more though."

Kaiba paused at that. True, Kaiba Corporation was one of the largest companies in the world, but it wasn't the largest. At least, not yet. And who knows? Maybe this guy could help him expand even more. "Alright, send him in."

"Yes sir."

A minute passed before the door to Kaiba's office opened, and in walked a man who Kaiba assumed was his visitor. He had long blonde hair that seemed disgustingly oily and went all the way down to his shoulders. His face was slightly sharp, giving him the appearance of an intellectual, and a simple pair of glasses rested in front of a pair of electric blue eyes. The man wore a silver jacket with blue highlights, a white shirt, and black pants. Upon his wrist he wore a strange, red device that had a blank black screen on top and seemed to hold a deck of Duel Monsters cards.

The man closed the door behind him and approached Kaiba's desk. "I assume you are Seto Kaiba?" His voice was slightly high in pitch, indicating that he must be a young adult, no older than 20 or 21.

Kaiba nodded. "That's correct. And you would be?"

The man bowed as he spoke. "My name is Kase Heiji, and may I say what an honor it is to be in your presence."

Kaiba smirked. "A flatterer, huh? Well, unfortunately for you, sweet talk won't work on me. Now, let's talk business."

Kase nodded. "Yes, of course. But, if you wouldn't mind, I have a request before we get to work." A quirked eye brow prompted him to continue. Raising the device on his arm up, Kase said, "If it isn't too much to ask, I would like to duel you. I usually get to know my partners before making any deals, and in your case, I think a duel is the best way to do that." He ended his sentence with a small smile.

Kaib thought about it for a few second before sighing and getting out of his chair. He quickly walked over to a nearby display stand and grabbed the duel disk resting on it, his deck already secured within. "This deal better be worth my time."

Kase chuckled as the two exited the office and called an elevator to take them to the KaibaCorp duel arena. "Trust me, Mr. Kaiba. If all goes well, neither of us should be left wanting," he said as the elevator arrived, and the two stepped inside.
13.title: Seto Kaiba

131.content:
The trip down to the arena was made in silence. The elevator's doors opened, blasting its occupants with a gust of cool air, and Kaiba and Kase began making their way to their positions on either end of the stadium. Once they were in place, Kase raised the red device on his arm and called out to Kaiba. "I hope you're ready for this, Mr. Kaiba!" A slot on the side of the device suddenly glowed, producing a black blade of energy with a bright blue outline. "Because I'm not going to hold back!"

Kaiba's eye brows raised as he activated his own duel disk, the blades sliding and rotating into place. "Must be a foreign model."

"LET'S DUEL!"

Kaiba: 4000
Kase: 4000

Kase grabbed the top 6 cards of his deck and added them to his hand. "I hope you don't mind, Mr. Kaiba, but I'll be taking the first move." He looked down at his hand and winced slightly. He removed one of the cards and placed it on his duel disk while he spoke. "I'll have to start by summoning Suanni, Fire of the Yang Zing!"

A dragon-like being emerged from the ground, its body covered in red scales. It turned its lion-headed neck towards Kaiba and roared, though it failed to produce any noticeable reaction from the young CEO. "Yang Zing? I've never heard of those cards..."

Kase grabbed two more cards and placed them face-down on his duel disk. "Now I'll Set two cards, and I'll pass the turn to you. Don't disappoint me, Mr. Kaiba."

Kaiba smirked as he drew from his deck. "I don't plan on it." He briefly scanned the cards in his hand before making his move. "First, I'll summon Kaiser Seahorse in Attack Mode! Next, I'll activate the spell card Double Summon! And thanks to my Seahorse's effect, he can be used as two Tributes for the summon of a LIGHT monster! So now I'll summon my Blue-Eyes White Dragon!"

A humanoid fish warrior appeared on Kaiba's field before it was engulfed in a bright light. As the light died down, Kaiba's field was now occupied by the white dragon of legend. It looked down on Kase's field and roared in the smaller dragon's face. Suanni merely glared back, its muscles tensing as it prepared to fight.

"Now my Blue-Eyes, destroy Suanni! White Lightning!" The large dragon breathed in before launching a torrent of high voltage electricity from its mouth.

As the cone of lightning approached Suanni, Kase smirked and revealed one of his face-downs. "I activated my trap, Yang Zing Brutality!" Suanni roared, somehow much louder than Blue-Eyes, and flew straight into the attack. The electricty seemed to curve around its body as Suanni rapidly approached Kaiba's dragon. "Whenever one of my Yang Zing monsters battles an opponent's monster, I can activate Brutality to increase my monster's ATK and DEF to double their original values! Which means this battle is ending in Suanni's favor!" The red dragon flew into the white dragon's face and the two fought. After a moment, Blue-Eyes was sent crashing to the ground, exploding into shards as it landed.

Kaiba: 4000 --> 3200

As Suanni landed, it suddenly convulsed in pain before exploding into shards as well. Kase sighed as he explained. "However, the monster effected by Yang Zing Brutality is automatically destroyed once the battle ends."

Kaiba smirked. "So you took out your own monster to get rid of mine? I can't tell if that brilliant or moronic."

Kase glared at him. "It's true that I destroyed my monster, but don't think I'd be dumb enough to do that without a plan! Whenever Suanni is destroyed, I'm allowed to summon another Yang Zing monster from my deck in Defense Mode to replace him!" A card popped out of his deck and Kase quickly placed it on his disk. "So I'll summon Jiaotu, Darkness of the Yang Zing!" Kase's monster took the form of a crawling black dragon with a surprising amount of facial hair. It looked at Kaiba and released a sinister hiss.

Kaiba grunted in frustration as he placed a single card on his duel disk. "I'll end my turn with a face-down! Hurry up so I can end this duel!"

Kase smirked as he drew. "You're not ending anything, Kaiba. I'm ending this duel this turn!" Kaiba raised an eyebrow at that, but decided to wait before making any comments.

Kase took two of his cards and sent them to the graveyard. "First, I'll use Jiaotu's effect! Because I control no other monster, I can send two Yang Zing cards in my hand to the graveyard to Special Summon two Yang Zing monsters from my deck, one with 0 ATK and one with 0 DEF! So come forth, Suanni, Fire of the Yang Zing and Bixi, Water of the Yang Zing!"

A cloud of darkness briefly erupted on either side of Jiaotu, and as his vanished it revealed the lion-headed form of Suanni and another dragon that seemed to be wearing a spiky turtle shell. Kaiba scoffed at the field. "Big deal, so you have a lot of monsters. You pretty much said it yourself that your Yang Zing Brutality card can't be used for direct attacks, so I don't know how you plan to defeat me now."

Kase smirked. "True, my Yang Zings can't beat you. But who said I was attacking with my Yang Zings?"

"What are you talking about about?!"

Kase flourished his hand towards his field. "Watch and learn, Kaiba! I tune the Level 2 Jiaotu with the Level 4 Suanni and the Level 2 Bixi!" Jiaotu dissolved, transforming into two green rings which wrapped around the other monsters, one each. Suanni and Bixi dissolved as well, transforming into 4 and 2 glowing balls of energy, respectively. As the clusters aligned, a glowing beam of light erupted in the center. "Synchro Summon!"

As the light beam died down, a massive roar was heard. "Mystical dragons of the stars, cast your shadows together and call upon the king of flies! Emerge from the Underworld, Beelze of the Diabolic Dragons!" The light finally vanished for good, revealing a terrifying monster. The creature's torso seemed vaguely humanoid, and its chest had what appeared to be two massive compound eyes. A long tail tapered off from where the legs would be, and from its shoulders erupted two long necks that were topped with fierce looking dragon heads. Kaiba unknowingly took a step back as the heads glared down at him, when suddenly ghostly images of Suanni and Bixi appeared and entered the beast's form.

"And now my monster's effects! Whenever I use Suanni as Synchro material, the summoned monster gains 500 ATK! And when I use Bixi, the monster becomes immune to trap effects!" Beelze once more roared as its ATK points increased. Kaiba, meanwhile, couldn't believe his eyes. He was about to lose to someone from some no-name business! He took a few more steps back, his arms falling to his sides, and started shaking his head slowly.

Kase grinned sadistically. "Now, Kaiba, I think it's time to end this duel! Beelze, attack him directly! Diabolic Crusher!" The dragon's twin mouths opened and began gathering shadows. The darkness coalesced into orbs, and once the orbs had grown large enough, they were sent flying at Kaiba. As they landed, Kaiba was briefly shocked to discover he could actually feel the attack before he was sent flying into the wall behind him. The combined damage was enough to knock him out.
131.title: Shocking Revelations

info.brief_description: What if Yugi was confronted by a duelist with a deck with cards not of his time?
info.description:
Duelists approch the charcters of Yugioh and challege them to a duel. But this duelists own cards not yet seen by this characters.
The duelists have Syncro and XYZ (exceed) monsters. This duelists work for a powerful man who operates everything from the shadows. They Yugioh gang must try and stop them before it is too late.
Rules:
1. The duelists that are from the future.
2. The duelists are OC's. You may have minor characters from this series join in later chapers.
3. The first duel against one of the future duelists is a loss. After the first win for the Yugioh gang you may have it that the duelist is unable to do any thing and they borrow some of his cards.
4. The duelist in the city use can Syncro's, it is not until the Yugioh gang gets close to the master mind that XYZs(exceeds) are intoduced. Decks must be made with real cards.
5. The mastermind must duel and win against Pegasis. You may or may not saw how this duel went down but if you are leading towards the use of XYZs before the right time do not descrive the monster in detail.
Set in a time after the Pharoh's spirit passes to the afterlife.
Follow the rules and, "It's Time to Duel!"

New rule:

In addition to Syncros and XYZs, Pendulum Summoning is allowed.
